children.title: Prettier Module
children.description: Set a folder containing the Prettier module. If unset, the extension first tries to resolve a workspace-specific installation, or uses the bundled module if 'Prefer Bundled Prettier' is enabled. If neither is available, the bundled module will be used as a fallback.

children.title: Prefer Bundled Prettier
children.description: Use the bundled Prettier module and plugins instead of resolving from the workspace. This is ignored if a custom Prettier module path is set.

children.title: Prettier Configuration
children.description:
Set a path to a custom Prettier configuration file. If unset, the extension will attempt to resolve one from the workspace or fall back to its own configuration.

Only files with JSON syntax are supported.

children.title: Ignore Configuration Files
children.description: Ignore all configuration files and always use the extension's configuration. This is ignored if a custom Prettier configuration file is set.

children.title: Advanced Syntax Detection
children.description: When enabled, Prettier⁺ will supplement Nova’s syntax detection with file‑extension fallback to choose the correct syntax. When disabled, it trusts Nova’s syntax detection only.

children.title: Log Debug Information
children.description: Send debug information to the Extension Console.

title: Prettier
description: Used for remote files, when no configuration file is found, or when configuration files are ignored.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Specify the line length that the printer will wrap on.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Specify the number of spaces per indentation-level.

children.title: Tabs
children.description: Indent lines with tabs instead of spaces.

children.title: Semicolons
children.description: Print semicolons at the ends of statements.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes.

children.title: Quote Props
children.description: Change when properties in objects are quoted.

children.title: JSX Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX.

children.title: Trailing Commas
children.description: Print trailing commas wherever possible in multi-line comma-separated syntactic structures. (A single-line array, for example, never gets trailing commas.)

children.title: Bracket Spacing
children.description: Print spaces between brackets in object literals.

children.title: Object Wrap
children.description: Configure how Prettier wraps object literals when they could fit on one line or span multiple lines.

children.title: Bracket Line
children.description: Put the > of a multi-line HTML (HTML, JSX, Vue, Angular) element at the end of the last line instead of being alone on the next line (does not apply to self closing elements).

children.title: Arrow Function Parentheses
children.description: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter.

children.title: Require Pragma
children.description: Prettier can restrict itself to only format files that contain a special comment, called a pragma, at the top of the file. This is very useful when gradually transitioning large, unformatted codebases to Prettier.

children.title: Insert Pragma
children.description: Prettier can insert a special @format marker at the top of files specifying that the file has been formatted with Prettier. This works well when used in tandem with the above Require Pragma option. If there is already a docblock at the top of the file then this option will add a newline to it with the @format marker.

children.title: Check Ignore Pragma
children.description: Prettier can allow individual files to opt out of formatting if they contain a special comment, called a pragma, at the top of the file.

children.title: Prose Wrap
children.description: By default, Prettier will not change wrapping in markdown text since some services use a linebreak-sensitive renderer, e.g. GitHub comments and BitBucket. To have Prettier wrap prose to the print width, change this option to "always". If you want Prettier to force all prose blocks to be on a single line and rely on editor/viewer soft wrapping instead, you can use "never".

children.title: HTML Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: Specify the global whitespace sensitivity for HTML, Vue, Angular, and Handlebars. See Prettier documentation for more info.

children.title: Vue files script and style tags indentation
children.description: Whether or not to indent the code inside <script> and <style> tags in Vue files.

children.title: End of Line
children.description: Specifies the newline control character.

children.title: Embedded Language Formatting
children.description: Control whether Prettier formats quoted code embedded in the file.

children.title: Single Attribute Per Line
children.description: Enforce single attribute per line in HTML, Vue, and JSX.

children.title: @prettier/plugin-php
children.description: PHP formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: PHP Version
children.description: Allows specifying the PHP version you're using. If you're using PHP 7.1 or later, setting this option will make use of modern language features in the printed output. If you're using PHP lower than 7.0, you'll have to set this option or Prettier will generate incompatible code.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier. The default is '4' based on the 'PSR-2' coding standard.

children.title: Tabs
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: If enabled, strings that use double quotes but do not rely on the features they add, will be reformatted.

children.title: Trailing Commas
children.description: If enabled, trailing commas will be added wherever possible. If disabled, no trailing commas are printed.

children.title: Brace Style
children.description: If set to 'per-cs', prettier will move open brace for code blocks (classes, functions and methods) onto new line. If set to '1tbs', prettier will move open brace for code blocks (classes, functions and methods) onto same line.

children.title: Require Pragma
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Insert Pragma
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: @prettier/plugin-xml
children.description: XML formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Bracket Line
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Single Attribute Per Line
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Quote Attributes
children.description: Quote style for XML attributes.

children.title: Self Closing Space
children.description: Adds a space before self-closing tags.

children.title: Sort Attributes by Key
children.description: Orders XML attributes by key alphabetically while prioritizing xmlns attributes.

children.title: Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: You may want 'ignore' or 'preserve', see the info.

children.title: prettier-plugin-astro
children.description: Astro formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Allow Shorthand
children.description: Enable/disable attribute shorthand if attribute name and expression are the same.

children.title: Skip Frontmatter
children.description: Skips the formatting of the frontmatter.

children.title: prettier-plugin-blade
children.description: Blade formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Attribute Wrapping
children.description: Controls how attributes in Blade templates are wrapped across lines.

children.title: Minimum Attributes to Wrap
children.description: Minimum number of html tag attributes for force wrap attribute options. Wrap the first attribute only if 'force-expand-multiline' is specified in wrap attributes.

children.title: End with Newline
children.description: Adds a newline at the end of the formatted output.

children.title: Sort Tailwind Classes
children.description: Sort Tailwind CSS classes automatically.

children.title: Tailwind Config
children.description: Path to a custom Tailwind CSS config file. Only used when 'Sort Tailwind Classes' is enabled.

children.title: HTML Attribute Sorting
children.description: Controls the order in which HTML attributes are sorted.

children.title: Custom Attribute Order
children.description: Comma-separated list defining the custom order of HTML attributes. Only applies when 'HTML Attribute Sorting' is set to 'custom'. Regex patterns are supported.

children.title: Disable PHP Syntax Check
children.description: Skips running a PHP syntax check before formatting Blade templates.

children.title: Indent Inner HTML
children.description: Indents the content inside <head> and <body> tags.

children.title: Extra Newlines Before Tags
children.description: Comma-separated list of tag names that should be preceded by an extra newline.

children.title: PHP Trailing Commas
children.description: Adds trailing commas in PHP expressions where possible. If disabled, no trailing commas will be printed.

children.title: PHP Version
children.description: Specifies the PHP version used for parsing Blade expressions. Affects syntax compatibility and formatting behavior.

children.title: Component Prefixes
children.description: Comma-separated list of component prefixes used to preserve attribute formatting.

children.title: prettier-plugin-ejs
children.description: EJS markup formatter plugin for Prettier

config.title: Plugin Enabled
config.description: Used only if 'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss' is disabled or Tailwind sorting is not enabled for the 'HTML (EJS)' syntax.

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description:
Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

Used only if 'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss' is disabled or Tailwind sorting is not enabled for the 'HTML (EJS)' syntax.

children.title: prettier-plugin-ejs-tailwindcss
children.description: EJS template formatter and Tailwind CSS class sorting plugin for Prettier

config.title: Plugin Enabled
config.description: Requires both 'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss' and Tailwind sorting enabled for the 'HTML (EJS)' syntax.

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description:
Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

Requires both 'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss' and Tailwind sorting enabled for the 'HTML (EJS)' syntax.

children.title: prettier-plugin-java
children.description: Java formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: prettier-plugin-liquid
children.description: Liquid formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tabs
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Bracket Line
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Liquid Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in Liquid tag and objects.

children.title: Embedded Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in embedded languages (JavaScript, CSS, TypeScript inside <script>, <style> or Liquid equivalent).

children.title: HTML Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Capture Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: Specify the default whitespace sensitivity of the 'capture' Liquid tag.

children.title: Single Line Link Tags
children.description: If enabled, will print <link> tags on a single line to remove clutter.

children.title: Indent Schema
children.description: If enabled, will indent the contents of the {% schema %} tag.

children.title: prettier-plugin-nginx
children.description: NGINX configuration files formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Tabs
children.description: Same as in Prettier.

children.title: Align Directives
children.description: Align directive parameters within a block to the same column.

children.title: Align Universally
children.description: Align all directive parameters within a file to the same column.

children.title: Wrap Parameters
children.description: Wrap parameters to new lines to fit print width.

children.title: Continuation Indent
children.description: Additional indentation for wrapped lines.

children.title: prettier-plugin-properties
children.description: Prettier plugin for .properties files

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Escape Non-Latin-1 Characters
children.description: Escape with \u all non-Latin-1 characters, to allow safely encoding output as ISO-8859-1.

children.title: Key Separator
children.description: Set the separator to use between a property key and its value.

children.title: prettier-plugin-sql
children.description: SQL formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Formatter
children.description: Specifies the formatter to use for SQL code formatting.

children.title: sql-formatter
children.description: Options for sql-formatter

children.title: Language
children.description: Sets the SQL dialect used for formatting. Choose 'Auto-Detect' to infer the dialect from the file extension (e.g., .pgsql → PostgreSQL, .sqlite → SQLite). Defaults to 'Generic SQL' if detection fails or the dialect is unsupported.

children.title: Keyword Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases keywords.

children.title: Data Type Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases data types.

children.title: Function Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases function names.

children.title: Identifier Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases identifiers. (experimental!)

children.title: Logical Operator Newline
children.description: Newline before or after boolean operator (AND, OR, XOR).

children.title: Expression Width
children.description: Maximum number of characters in parenthesized expressions to be kept on single line.

children.title: Lines Between Queries
children.description: How many newlines to insert between queries.

children.title: Dense Operators
children.description: Packs operators densely without spaces.

children.title: Newline Before Semicolon
children.description: Places semicolon on separate line.

children.title: Parameter
children.description: Specifies parameter values to fill in for placeholders inside SQL.

children.title: Parameter Types
children.description: Specifies parameter types to support when parsing SQL prepared statements.

children.title: node-sql-parser
children.description: Options for node-sql-parser

children.title: Language
children.description: Sets the SQL dialect used for parsing. Choose 'Auto-Detect' to infer the dialect from the file extension (e.g., .pgsql → PostgreSQL). Defaults to 'MySQL' if detection fails or the dialect is unsupported.

children.title: Type
children.description: Specifies whether to focus on tables or columns for parsing and formatting in SQL queries.

children.title: prettier-plugin-tailwindcss
children.description: Tailwind CSS class sorting plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Tailwind Config
children.description: Specifies the Tailwind JavaScript config path.

children.title: Tailwind Stylesheet
children.description: Specifies the Tailwind stylesheet path.

children.title: Non-Standard Attributes
children.description: Sorting order for non-standard attributes.

children.title: Functions and Templates
children.description: Sorting order for classes in function calls and tagged template literals.

children.title: Preserve Whitespace
children.description: If enabled, preserves original whitespace between classes. If disabled, removes unnecessary whitespace between classes for consistent formatting.

children.title: Preserve Duplicate Classes
children.description: If enabled, preserves duplicate classes when classes and templating syntax can’t be distinguished (e.g., in Fluid or Blade). If disabled, removes duplicate classes automatically for cleaner output.

children.title: Syntaxes
children.description: Syntaxes where Tailwind CSS class sorting should be applied.

children.title: prettier-plugin-toml
children.description: TOML formatter plugin fot Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Align Entries
children.description: Align consecutive entries vertically.

children.title: Align Comments
children.description: Align consecutive comments after entries and items vertically. This applies to comments that are after entries or array items.

children.title: Auto Expand Arrays
children.description: Expand arrays to multiple lines that exceed the maximum column width.

children.title: Auto Collapse Arrays
children.description: Collapse arrays that don't exceed the maximum column width and don't contain comments.

children.title: Compact Arrays
children.description: Omit white space padding from single-line arrays.

children.title: Compact Inline Tables
children.description: Omit white space padding from the start and end of inline tables.

children.title: Compact Entries
children.description: Omit white space around '='.

children.title: Indent Tables
children.description: Indent based on tables and arrays of tables and their subtables, subtables out of order are not indented.

children.title: Indent Entries
children.description: Indent entries under tables.

children.title: Reorder Keys
children.description: Alphabetically reorder keys that are not separated by empty lines.

children.title: Blank Lines
children.description: The maximum number of allowed blank lines between entries and tables.

children.title: prettier-plugin-twig
children.description: Twig formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes in Twig files.

children.title: Break Objects
children.description: Should objects always break in Twig files.

children.title: Follow Official Coding Standards
children.description: Follow the offical coding standards exactly. If disabled, some slight deviations might occur, such as spaces around the filter operator (e.g. 's | upper' instead of 's|upper').

children.title: Output Endblock Name
children.description: Choose whether to output the block name in {% endblock %} tags (e.g., {% endblock content %}) or not.

children.title: Multi-Tags
children.description: A sequences of non-standard Twig tags that should be treated as belonging together.

children.title: Test Expressions
children.description: Make custom Twig tests known to the parser.

children.title: Format on Save
children.description: Automatically format documents when they are saved.

children.title: Ignore Without Config
children.description: When enabled, documents without a Prettier configuration file will not be formatted on save.

children.title: Ignore Remote Documents
children.description: When enabled, remote documents will be ignored during format on save.

children.title: Ignored Syntaxes
children.description: Documents that are set to an ignored syntax will not be formatted when saved.
